item.title: Gilgo Beach murders: Stunning details emerge as suspect charged in 7th death
item.description: Accused Gilgo Beach serial killer Rex Heuermann is being charged with a seventh murder: the death of Valerie Mack, officials said.

item.title: WATCH: Another part of the US sinking?
item.description: Researchers at the University of Miami found at least 35 coastal buildings in South Florida are affected by what they call subsidence.

item.title: WATCH: Video shows baby thrown from van during police chase
item.description: The infant was reunited with his mother after being ejected from a van during a police chase in Ohio.
